item.title: Docs: AzureDisk
item.description: Azure disk Container Storage Interface (CSI) Storage Plugin is moved to https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/azuredisk-csi-driver. Please check the github link for documentation.

item.title: Docs: AzureFile
item.description: Azure file Container Storage Interface (CSI) Storage Plugin is moved to https://github.com/kubernetes-sigs/azurefile-csi-driver. Please check the github link for documentation.
